attributes.action: Take Harry & Megan Markle off the taxpayers funded list.
attributes.additional_details: Snubbing President Trump, no photographs of the Royal(?) baby, private  Christening, etc.....
attributes.background: They do not perform royal duties but only choose to attend anything American, ie baseball, etc whilst snubbing President Trump.  If you take taxpayers money you have to perform royal duties whether you like them or not!

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the UK Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

The Duke of Sussex carries out public engagements in support of the Queen and the Royal Family in the UK and overseas. You can find out more here:

https://www.royal.uk/prince-harry

There is no longer a Civil List. The Civil List and Grants-in-Aid, for travel, communications and information, and maintenance of the Royal Palaces were replaced by a single, consolidated annual grant called the Sovereign Grant.

The Sovereign Grant is fixed at a percentage of the income from the Crown Estate. You can find out more here:

https://www.gov.uk/government/publications/sovereign-grant-act-2011-guidance/sovereign-grant-act-2011-guidance

We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. 

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
